 It seems like you're inquiring about notifications on XWiki. Here is some relevant information I found:

XWiki has a Notifications feature that allows users to receive alerts about various events on the wiki. These events can include being mentioned or actions performed on pages they created or updated. Users can also customize which types of notifications they want to receive, such as when a page is created or a blog post is published ([source](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HSettings)).

There's also a Notifications Macro that provides a way to display notifications. The macro has its own application and can be configured through the notifications menu ([source](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Macro/)).

A wiki administrator can change the way notifications are displayed in the notification tray using the NotificationDisplayerClass XObject ([source](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Module/#HOverridedefaultnotificationtemplatesinwikipages)).

Please note that I couldn't find any information about a "cloche en haut à droite" (bell at the top right) in relation to XWiki notifications. It is possible that this feature is not available or was removed.

## Notifications Macro

The [Notifications Macro is provided by its own application](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Macro/).

# Settings

On the notifications menu, you also have a link to go to the "settings" of the notifications.

![notif4.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/notif4.png?rev=1.8)

By default, users only get notifications when they are mentioned or when actions are performed on pages they created or updated. For receiving other notifications, you need to select which "types" of notifications you want to receive. When a page is created? When a blog post is published?

## Override default notification templates in wiki pages

A wiki administrator can change the way notifications are displayed in the notification tray using the [NotificationDisplayerClass XObject](http://www.github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/tree/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-notifications/xwiki-platform-notifications-default/src/main/java/org/xwiki/notifications/internal/WikiNotificationDisplayerDocumentInitializer.java). You can get more informations about this feature in the [Notifications API documentation](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Module/#HCreatecustomnotificationtemplates).
